verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, came אַֽחֲרֵי֙ <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei Now it came to pass after מ֣וֹת <S%H4191><s%> Mot crying שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, of Saul וְדָוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> ve-da-Vid when David שָׁ֔ב <S%H7725><s%> Shav, was returned מֵהַכּ֖וֹת <S%H5221><s%> me-hak-Kot from the slaughter אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הָעֲמָלֵ֑ק <S%H6002><s%> ha-'a-ma-Lek; of the Amalekites וַיֵּ֧שֶׁב <S%H3427><s%> vai-Ye-shev had abode דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid and David בְּצִקְלָ֖ג <S%H6860><s%> be-tzik-Lag in Ziklag יָמִ֥ים <S%H3117><s%> ya-Mim days שְׁנָֽיִם׃ <S%H8147><s%> she-Na-yim. two

וַיְהִ֣י׀ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> bai-Yom day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֗י <S%H7992><s%> hash-she-li-Shi, It came even to pass on the third וְהִנֵּה֩ <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh behold אִ֨ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish that behold a man בָּ֤א <S%H935><s%> ba came מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- out הַֽמַּחֲנֶה֙ <S%H4264><s%> ham-ma-cha-Neh out of the camp מֵעִ֣ם <S%H5973><s%> me-'Im from שָׁא֔וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul, from Saul וּבְגָדָ֣יו <S%H899><s%> u-ve-ga-Dav with his clothes קְרֻעִ֔ים <S%H7167><s%> ke-ru-'Im, rent וַאֲדָמָ֖ה <S%H127><s%> va-'a-da-Mah and earth עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on רֹאשׁ֑וֹ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sho; upon his head וַיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi came בְּבֹא֣וֹ <S%H935><s%> be-vo-'O and [so] it was when he came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, to David וַיִּפֹּ֥ל <S%H5307><s%> vai-yip-Pol that he fell אַ֖רְצָה <S%H776><s%> 'Ar-tzah to the earth וַיִּשְׁתָּֽחוּ׃ <S%H7812><s%> vai-yish-Ta-chu. and did obeisance

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said לוֹ֙ lo דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, And David אֵ֥י <S%H335><s%> 'ei where מִזֶּ֖ה <S%H2088><s%> miz-Zeh he תָּב֑וֹא <S%H935><s%> ta-Vo; unto him From whence comest וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer thou;And he said אֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, from מִמַּחֲנֵ֥ה <S%H4264><s%> mi-ma-cha-Neh unto him Out of the camp יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El of Israel נִמְלָֽטְתִּי׃ <S%H4422><s%> nim-La-te-ti. am I escaped

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said אֵלָ֥יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav about דָּוִ֛ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid And David מֶה־ <S%H4100><s%> meh- unto him How הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become הַדָּבָ֖ר <S%H1697><s%> had-da-Var things הַגֶּד־ <S%H5046><s%> hag-ged- tell נָ֣א <S%H4994><s%> na I beseech thee לִ֑י Li; וַ֠יֹּאמֶר <S%H559><s%> Vai-yo-mer me And he answered אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after נָ֨ס <S%H5127><s%> nas are fled הָעָ֜ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am That the people מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- from הַמִּלְחָמָ֗ה <S%H4421><s%> ham-mil-cha-Mah, from the battle וְגַם־ <S%H1571><s%> ve-gam- and also הַרְבֵּ֞ה <S%H7235><s%> har-Beh and many נָפַ֤ל <S%H5307><s%> na-Fal also are fallen מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- at הָעָם֙ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am of the people וַיָּמֻ֔תוּ <S%H4191><s%> vai-ya-Mu-tu, and dead וְגַ֗ם <S%H1571><s%> ve-Gam, also שָׁא֛וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul and Saul וִיהוֹנָתָ֥ן <S%H3083><s%> vi-ho-na-Tan and Jonathan בְּנ֖וֹ <S%H1121><s%> be-No his son מֵֽתוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> Me-tu. are dead

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer said דָּוִ֔ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid, And David אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַנַּ֖עַר <S%H5288><s%> han-Na-'ar unto the young man הַמַּגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> ham-mag-Gid that told ל֑וֹ lo; אֵ֣יךְ <S%H349><s%> 'eich How יָדַ֔עְתָּ <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ta, him How knowest כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for מֵ֥ת <S%H4191><s%> met be dead שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul thou that Saul וִיהֽוֹנָתָ֥ן <S%H3083><s%> vi-ho-na-Tan and Jonathan בְּנֽוֹ׃ <S%H1121><s%> be-No. his son

וַיֹּ֜אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer him said הַנַּ֣עַר׀ <S%H5288><s%> han-Na-'ar And the young man הַמַּגִּ֣יד <S%H5046><s%> ham-mag-Gid that told ל֗וֹ lo, נִקְרֹ֤א <S%H7122><s%> nik-Ro by chance נִקְרֵ֙יתִי֙ <S%H7136><s%> nik-Rei-ti As I happened בְּהַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> be-Har upon mount הַגִּלְבֹּ֔עַ <S%H1533><s%> hag-gil-Bo-a', Gilboa וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold שָׁא֖וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul behold Saul נִשְׁעָ֣ן <S%H8172><s%> nish-'An leaned עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- on חֲנִית֑וֹ <S%H2595><s%> cha-ni-To; upon his spear וְהִנֵּ֥ה <S%H2009><s%> ve-hin-Neh and behold הָרֶ֛כֶב <S%H7393><s%> ha-Re-chev and lo the chariots וּבַעֲלֵ֥י <S%H1167><s%> u-va-'a-Lei archer הַפָּרָשִׁ֖ים <S%H6571><s%> hap-pa-ra-Shim and the horsemen הִדְבִּקֻֽהוּ׃ <S%H1692><s%> hid-bi-Ku-hu. followed hard

וַיִּ֥פֶן <S%H6437><s%> vai-Yi-fen And when he looked אַחֲרָ֖יו <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rav behind וַיִּרְאֵ֑נִי <S%H7200><s%> vai-yir-'E-ni; him he saw וַיִּקְרָ֣א <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-Ra me and called אֵלָ֔י <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lai, to me וָאֹמַ֖ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar unto me And I answered הִנֵּֽנִי׃ <S%H2005><s%> hin-Ne-ni. behold

וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer And he said לִ֖י li מִי־ <S%H4310><s%> mi- Who אָ֑תָּה <S%H859><s%> 'At-tah; you; וַיֹּאמֶר vai-yo-mer כוָאֹמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> va-'o-Mar said קאֵלָ֔יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, about עֲמָלֵקִ֖י <S%H6003><s%> 'a-mal-Ki him I [am] an Amalekite אָנֹֽכִי׃ <S%H595><s%> 'a-No-chi. he

וָאֶעֱמֹ֤ד <S%H5975><s%> va-'e-'e-Mod So I stood עָלָיו֙ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lav beside וַאֲמֹ֣תְתֵ֔הוּ <S%H4191><s%> va-'a-Mo-te-Te-hu, upon him and slew כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> ki because יָדַ֔עְתִּי <S%H3045><s%> ya-Da'-ti, him because I was sure כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> ki because לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> lo not יִֽחְיֶ֖ה <S%H2421><s%> yich-Yeh that he could not live אַחֲרֵ֣י <S%H310><s%> 'a-cha-Rei after נִפְל֑וֹ <S%H5307><s%> nif-Lo; that he was fallen וָאֶקַּ֞ח <S%H3947><s%> va-'ek-Kach and I took הַנֵּ֣זֶר׀ <S%H5145><s%> han-Ne-zer the crown אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- beside רֹאשׁ֗וֹ <S%H7218><s%> ro-Sho, that [was] upon his head וְאֶצְעָדָה֙ <S%H685><s%> ve-'etz-'a-Dah and the bracelet אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- beside זְרֹע֔וֹ <S%H2220><s%> ze-ro-'O, that [was] on his arm וָאֲבִיאֵ֥ם <S%H935><s%> va-'a-vi-'Em and have brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to אֲדֹנִ֖י <S%H113><s%> 'a-do-Ni them hither unto my lord הֵֽנָּה׃ <S%H2008><s%> Hen-nah. here

וַֽיִּסְפְּדוּ֙ <S%H5594><s%> vai-yis-pe-Du And they mourned וַיִּבְכּ֔וּ <S%H1058><s%> vai-yiv-Ku, and wept וַיָּצֻ֖מוּ <S%H6684><s%> vai-ya-Tzu-mu and fasted עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- until הָעָ֑רֶב <S%H6153><s%> ha-'A-rev; until even עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- for שָׁא֞וּל <S%H7586><s%> sha-'Ul for Saul וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and יְהוֹנָתָ֣ן <S%H3083><s%> ye-ho-na-Tan and for Jonathan בְּנ֗וֹ <S%H1121><s%> be-No, his son וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and for עַ֤ם <S%H5971><s%> 'am and for the people יְהוָה֙ <S%H3069><s%> Yah-weh God וְעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> ve-'al- and בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit and for the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki because נָפְל֖וּ <S%H5307><s%> na-fe-Lu because they were fallen בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <S%H2719><s%> be-Cha-rev. by the sword ס sa-Mek

I
